law.catch_line: Applicability of chapter to actions in District Court -- Exception.
law.text: The provisions of this chapter shall apply to venue and change of venue in civil, criminal, and penal actions in District Courts, except that, for change of venue, an action shall be transferred to a District Court of another county and not to a Circuit Court.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 464, effective January 2, 1978.
